Translations.Text: wahal ataka naba-u l-khasmi idh tasawwaru l-mih'raba
idh dakhalu ʿala dawuda fafaziʿa min'hum qalu la takhaf khasmani bagha baʿduna ʿala baʿdin fa-uh'kum baynana bil-haqi wala tush'tit wa-ih'dina ila sawai l-sirati
inna hadha akhi lahu tis'ʿun watis'ʿuna naʿjatan waliya naʿjatun wahidatun faqala akfil'niha waʿazzani fi l-khitabi

qala laqad zalamaka bisuali naʿjatika ila niʿajihi wa-inna kathiran mina l-khulatai layabghi baʿduhum ʿala baʿdin illa alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati waqalilun ma hum wazanna dawudu annama fatannahu fa-is'taghfara rabbahu wakharra rakiʿan wa-anaba
faghafarna lahu dhalika wa-inna lahu ʿindana lazul'fa wahus'na maabin
